Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Opiscorpine 1 (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; modular design; 3S=S, UCSS1a; more AMPs? Opiscorpine 2; Opiscorpine 3; Opiscorpine 4)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 69.2% similar toscorpion Hp1036. Activity for the entire two-domain molecule has not been demonstrated. A synthetic peptide (Jan-f3) corresponding to the N-temrinal 35 amino acids was found to be active against F. culmorum and F. oxysporum (IC50 8.8 and 10.04 uM). It is also active against E. coli JM109. A shorter fragment with 9 residues (Jan-f1) was inactive.
Literature Information.Author: Zhu S, Tytgat J.2004
Literature Information.Title: The scorpine family of defensins: gene structure, alternative polyadenylation and fold recognition
